properties.title: Major Urban Expansion
properties.description: Significant urban development begins in Kisumu, leading to increased impervious surfaces and reduced vegetation cover.

properties.title: Climate Change Effects
properties.description: Rising temperatures and changing precipitation patterns begin to significantly impact local ecosystems and agriculture.

properties.title: Conservation Initiatives
properties.description: Local and international conservation efforts begin to address environmental degradation around Lake Victoria.

properties.title: Agricultural Adaptation
properties.description: Farmers begin adopting climate-smart agricultural practices to cope with changing environmental conditions.

properties.title: Water Quality Crisis
properties.description: Lake Victoria faces significant water quality challenges affecting local communities and ecosystems.
